agilermi.core

Class RMIObjectInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.ObjectInputStream
        • agilermi.core.RMIObjectInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.ObjectInput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class RMIObjectInputStream
extends java.io.ObjectInputStream
    This class extends the standard ObjectInputStream and it gives an RMI context to the deserialized RemoteInvocationHandler instances. This class allows to implement of the automatic remote referencing mechanism, that replaces all the remote object references with their remote stubs, when they are sent on the network. Its counterpart is the RMIObjectInputStream class.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIObjectInputStream

        public RMIObjectInputStream(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                            RMIRegistry registry)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes an RMIObjectInputStream over the given InputStream with the specified registry. This allows to read persisted object stubs providing them the information needed to become active.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream the stubs will be read from.
        registry - the registry to provide to the persisted stubs.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
